data.current_summary: Returns all regions present in Tanzania
data.current_description: Fetches all regions present in Tanzania and then return a response as json
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a complete list of all administrative regions in Tanzania. Accepts a country parameter to specify the target country. Returns a JSON array containing region objects with region names, codes, and metadata. No authentication required.
data.reasoning: Current description is vague about what data is returned and lacks clarity on the country parameter's role. Improved description specifies the return format (JSON array), what fields are included, and clarifies that no authentication is needed for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'Districts-in-a-region' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original description mentions 'post code' ambiguously. Improved version clarifies that both region and country parameters are required, specifies the return structure (JSON array with district details), and explains the operation's role in hierarchical location navigation.

data.current_description: Returns a post code and all districts in a specified region
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all districts within a specified region of Tanzania. Requires country and region parameters to identify the target region. Returns a JSON array of district objects including district names, codes, and postal codes. Useful for hierarchical location queries.
data.reasoning: Original description mentions 'post code' ambiguously. Improved version clarifies that both region and country parameters are required, specifies the return structure (JSON array with district details), and explains the operation's role in hierarchical location navigation.

data.current_summary: Returns all wards in a district
data.current_description: Returns all wards in a  specified district and district postcode
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all wards within a specified district in Tanzania. Requires country, region, and district parameters to identify the target district.
